description: The `v-date-input` component combines a text field with a date picker.

props.hideActions: Hide the Cancel and OK buttons, and automatically update the value when a date is selected.
props.displayFormat: The format of the date that is displayed in the input. Can use any format [here](/features/dates/#format-options) or a custom function.
props.inputFormat: Format for manual date input. Use yyyy, mm, dd with separators '.', '-', '/' (e.g. 'yyyy-mm-dd', 'dd/mm/yyyy').
props.location: Specifies the date picker's location. Can combine by using a space separated string.
props.updateOn: Specifies when the text input should update the model value. If empty, the text field will go into read-only state.
